title: Font Name
content:
Does anybody know what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804232916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ResizedImage_1374975091812_3560.jpg)

Thanks for any help!
author: vaudtzee

comments.content:
Not much to go on. But I can say that the split ends and spurs on the sides of the vertical strokes would put this in the category of a Tuscan font, popular in the 19th century. So a search for Tuscan fonts should turn up something you like.  
Don
